value.verse:
“Behold, I am coming soon,” says the Lord,
“and bringing my reward with me, *
“I am the Alpha and the Omega, the first and the last, *

Blessed are those who do God’s commandments,
that they may have the right to the tree of life, *
value.halfverse: and may enter the city through the gates.
with this testimony for all the churches.
value.verse: “I, Jesus, have sent my angel to you, *

value.halfverse: I am the bright morning star.”
value.verse: “I am the root and the offspring of David, *
“Come!” say the Spirit and the Bride; *

value.halfverse: let those who desire take the water of life as a gift.
value.verse: Come forward, you who are thirsty, *
